definitions.definition: A London borough of Greater London , extending as far as Crystal Palace south of the River Thames , including the historic borough plus the Pool of London and Bankside.
An area of this borough just south of the Thames in central London ( OS grid ref TQ3280 ) .

main_definition: A London borough of Greater London , extending as far as Crystal Palace south of the River Thames , including the historic borough plus the Pool of London and Bankside.
secondary_definitions: An area of this borough just south of the Thames in central London ( OS grid ref TQ3280 ) .
